articles.author: Taylor Rains
articles.title: Photos from the American Airlines fire show passengers made a huge mistake - Business Insider
articles.description: A slower evacuation because of people taking their bags could lead to more injuries or even fatalities. There are recent examples to prove it.
articles.content:
Photos of a burning American Airlines jet on Thursday show dozens of evacuating passengers standing on the wing with their bags in tow breaking one of the most important safety rules.
